item.title: 美国 11 月独户住宅开工率反弹
item.description: 随着飓风的影响逐渐减弱，美国单户住宅建设在 11 月份出现反弹，但对进口商品征收关税的威胁以及大规模驱逐可能造成的劳动力短缺可能会阻碍明年的新建筑工程。【原文：U.S. single-family homebuilding rebounded in November as the drag from hurricanes faded, but the threat of tariffs on imported goods and potential labor shortages from mass deportations could hamper new construction next year.】

item.title: 标准普尔称日产本田合并不会带来快速解决方案
item.description: S&P分析师周三表示，本田和日产的合并不会带来快速收益，因为这两家汽车制造商首先需要调整战略，而重叠的区域市场将限制销售收益。【原文：A merger between Honda and Nissan would not come with quick gains, as the automakers would first need to align their strategies while overlapping regional markets would limit the sales benefits, S&P analysts said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 刚果律师称苹果供应链声明必须经过验证
item.description: 刚果民主共和国的国际律师对苹果公司因冲突恶化而决定停止从该国采购矿产表示欢迎，但表示他们将继续在欧洲起诉该公司。【原文：International lawyers for the Democratic Republic of Congo welcomed Apple's decision to stop sourcing minerals from there due to worsening conflict, but said they would press ahead with their cases against the company in Europe.】

item.title: Sam Altman 支持的 Oklo 公司与数据中心运营商签署电力协议
item.description: 山姆-奥特曼（Sam Altman）支持的核电初创公司 Oklo Inc 周三表示，该公司已经签署了一份不具约束力的协议，将为拉斯维加斯的数据中心运营商 Switch 提供电力。【原文：Sam Altman-backed nuclear startup Oklo Inc said on Wednesday it has signed a non-binding agreement to provide power to Las Vegas-based data center operator Switch.】

item.title: Swiss report on Credit Suisse collapse to be published Friday
item.description: A Swiss parliamentary report into how authorities managed the 2023 collapse of Credit Suisse will be published on Friday, the Swiss parliament said on Wednesday.

item.title: Instagram to make up more than half of Meta's US ad revenue in 2025, report shows
item.description: Instagram is set to account for more than half of Meta Platforms' advertising revenue in the United States next year, as the social media platform improves monetization of its products, according to research firm Emarketer.

item.title: General Mills beats second-quarter sales estimates, lowers profit forecast
item.description: General Mills beat quarterly sales and profit estimates on Wednesday, boosted by its efforts to reduce prices on some products and improve demand.

item.title: 早间竞价：市场焦虑不安，等待美联储
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 市场等待美联储决议，期货价格稳步走高
item.description: 周三，美国股指期货走高，交易商在等待美联储今年最后一次利率决定，以及有关决策者是否会在 2025 年采取更加谨慎立场的信号。【原文：U.S. stock index futures were higher on Wednesday, as traders waited for the Federal Reserve's final rate decision of the year and signals on whether policymakers will take a more cautious stance in 2025.】

item.title: 鲍威尔在担任美联储主席的最后一整年里有很多工作要做
item.description: 美联储将于本周三结束2024年的最后一次会议，明年很可能是美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔执掌美国央行的最后一个完整任期，他的四年任期将于2026年5月届满。【原文：The Federal Reserve will conclude its final meeting of 2024 on Wednesday, and next year will likely be Fed Chair Jerome Powell's last full one at the helm of the U.S. central bank, with his four-year term due to expire in May of 2026.】

item.title: 美联储似将调整逆回购利率以加速现金退出
item.description: 随着美联储进入一个更加不确定的时期，在许多人看来，这是美联储缩减资产负债表努力的最后几个月，美联储似乎有可能在周三采取一项措施，将现金从其资产负债表中移除。【原文：The Federal Reserve appears likely to take a step on Wednesday to nudge cash off its balance sheet as it enters a more uncertain period in what many see as the final months in its effort to draw down its balance sheet.】

item.title: 聚焦：眼看特朗普 2.0 关税即将到来，美国玩具制造商跃跃欲试
item.description: 由于即将上任的特朗普政府承诺对美国进口商品征收全新一轮的关税，总部位于亚特兰大的 Kids2 和其他玩具制造商正在审查产品线，寻找限制新征税成本的方法。【原文：With the incoming Trump administration promising an entirely new round of tariffs on U.S. imports, Atlanta-based Kids2 and other toymakers are reviewing product lines, looking for ways to limit the cost of new levies.】

item.title: 特朗普关税威胁有助于提升美国海洋产品进口量
item.description: 当美国总统候选人唐纳德-特朗普在竞选活动中开始谈论新的进口关税时，丹尼-雷诺兹检查了他婚纱沙龙里婚纱的标签，并加快了向他位于印第安纳州的独立服装店发货的速度。【原文：When U.S. presidential candidate Donald Trump started talking about new import tariffs on the campaign trail, Danny Reynolds checked the tags on wedding dresses in his bridal salon and sped up some shipments to his independent clothing store in Indiana.】

item.title: 阿曼国家新闻称，阿曼投资局收购埃隆-马斯克的 XAI 公司股份
item.description: 阿曼国家通讯社周三称，阿曼投资局（OIA）已经收购了埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）拥有的人工智能公司 XAI 的股份。【原文：The Oman Investment Authority (OIA) has acquired a stake in the artificial intelligence company XAI owned by Elon Musk, Omani state news agency said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，雷诺对日产寻求与本田进行合并谈判持开放态度
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周三报道，日产汽车的最大股东雷诺对这家日本汽车制造商与同行业的本田汽车进行合并谈判持开放态度。【原文：Nissan Motor's largest shareholder Renault is open to the Japanese automaker pursuing merger talks with peer Honda Motor , Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 宏观经济是对冲基金投资者押注 2025 年市场波动的必备工具
item.description: 明年对冲基金策略的首选是所谓的宏观，美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普将成为核心人物，投资者将押注全球政策决定将如何影响经济状况并在金融市场上发挥作用。【原文：Next year's top pick for hedge fund strategies is so-called macro, with U.S. President-elect Donald Trump centre-stage as investors bet on how global policy decisions will impact economic conditions and play out in financial markets.】

item.title: Birkenstock第四季度收入因需求回升而增长
item.description: 本周三，Birkenstock 第四季度营收超出市场预期，这主要得益于这家德国鞋类制造商的高价凉鞋全价销售强劲。【原文：Birkenstock beat market expectations for fourth-quarter revenue on Wednesday, helped by robust full-price sales of the German footwear maker's pricey sandals.】

item.title: 美国监管机构警告信用卡发行商不要贬低奖励价值
item.description: 美国消费者金融最高监督机构周三警告说，信用卡公司如果贬低或取消持卡人获得的积分、现金返还或里程数，可能会触犯法律。【原文：Credit card companies that devalue or cancel the rewards points, cash back or miles that cardholders have earned may be breaking the law, the top U.S. watchdog agency for consumer finance warned on Wednesday.】

item.title: G20 监督机构敦促各国政府应对非银行金融风险
item.description: 金融稳定委员会（FSB）周三向各国政府提出了降低对冲基金、保险公司和其他非银行金融中介机构风险的建议。【原文：The Financial Stability Board (FSB) on Wednesday pitched recommendations for governments to reduce risks around hedge funds, insurers and other non-bank financial intermediaries, which now account for almost half of global financial assets.】

item.title: 消息人士称，大众汽车与工会周三将继续就工厂和就业问题进行马拉松式谈判
item.description: 据两位熟悉谈判情况的消息人士透露，大众汽车与工会就削减德国业务的谈判一直持续到周三晚上，双方都在为在圣诞节前达成解决方案而努力。【原文：Talks between Volkswagen and unions on cuts to its German operations continued through the night and into Wednesday, according to two sources familiar with negotiations, as the sides battle to reach a solution before Christmas.】

item.title: 从美国 "中国军工企业 "名单中除名后，AMEC 股票大涨
item.description: 先进微细加工设备公司（AMEC）是中国领先的芯片设备制造商之一，五角大楼称该公司涉嫌与中国政府军方合作，并将其从中国公司名单中除名，此后该公司股价周三大涨 4.35%。【原文：Shares in Advanced Micro-Fabrication Equipment (AMEC), one of China's leading chip equipment makers, jumped 4.35% on Wednesday after it was removed from a list of Chinese companies the Pentagon said were allegedly working with Beijing's military.】

item.title: 致员工信显示特斯拉中国工厂负责人宋刚离职
item.description: 根据特斯拉上海工厂经理宋刚周三发给员工的一封信，他已离开公司。【原文：Tesla's Shanghai plant manager Song Gang has left the company, according to a letter he sent to staff on Wednesday.】

item.title: 日本的 Seven & i 计划到 2027 年在美国和加拿大开设 500 家门店
item.description: 日本 Seven & i 控股公司周三表示，计划到 2027 年在美国和加拿大新开 500 家便利店。【原文：Japan's Seven & i Holdings said on Wednesday it plans to open 500 new convenience stores in the United States and Canada through 2027.】

item.title: 英国 11 月通胀率达到 2.6%，服务价格增长保持稳定
item.description: 英国 11 月份的通胀率升至八个月来的最高点，但英国央行密切关注的一项基本物价增长指标却保持稳定，这让央行稍稍松了一口气。【原文：British inflation rose to its highest in eight months in November but an underlying measure of price growth watched closely by the Bank of England held steady, offering the central bank a little bit of relief.】

item.title: 埃隆-马斯克称，在印度查获第二台设备后，"星链 "已停止运行
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）说，Starlink 卫星互联网在印度已停止使用，这是他在最近几周当局扣押了该公司的两台设备（一台在武装冲突地区，另一台在毒品走私案中）后首次发表评论。【原文：Elon Musk said Starlink satellite internet is inactive in India, his first comments since authorities seized two of the company's devices in recent weeks, one in an armed conflict zone and another in a drug smuggling bust.】

item.title: 日产与本田的对比
item.description: 据知情人士透露，日本汽车制造商本田和日产正在商谈深化关系，包括可能进行合并，因为特斯拉和中国竞争对手的挑战促使日本汽车业进行重组。【原文：Japanese carmakers Honda and Nissan are in talks to deepen ties, according to sources, including a possible merger, as challenges from Tesla and Chinese rivals urge a restructuring of Japan's auto industry.】

item.title: 美联储有望将降息与 2025 年鹰派前景相结合
item.description: 美联储预计将在周三降低借贷成本，一些观察家将此称为 "鹰派降息"，与此同时，政策制定者还将更新利率展望和经济预测，内容涵盖即将上任的特朗普政府上任后的头几个月。【原文：The Federal Reserve is expected to lower borrowing costs on Wednesday in what some observers are calling a "hawkish cut" set to be delivered alongside policymakers' updated interest rate outlooks and economic forecasts covering the first months of the incoming Trump administration.】

item.title: 欧洲的难题：如何为国防开支提供资金
item.description: 欧盟东部边境战火纷飞，俄罗斯构成威胁，美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）向盟友施压，要求他们采取更多行动，因此欧盟迫切需要一个可行的计划，以确保获得数千亿欧元来加强防御。【原文：With a war raging at the European Union's eastern border, Russia posing a threat, and U.S. President-elect Donald Trump pressuring allies to do more, the bloc urgently needs a viable plan to secure hundreds of billions of euros to bolster its defences.】

item.title: 消息人士称，"欧佩克+"对特朗普领导下的美国石油产量再次上升保持警惕
item.description: 欧佩克+"的代表们说，欧佩克+"对唐纳德-特朗普重返白宫后美国石油产量的再次上升持谨慎态度，因为更多的美国石油将进一步侵蚀 "欧佩克+"的市场份额，并阻碍该生产国集团支撑油价的努力。【原文：OPEC+ is wary of a renewed rise in U.S. oil output when Donald Trumpreturns to the White House, delegates from the group said, because more U.S. oil would further erode OPEC+ market share and hamper the producer group's efforts to support prices.】

item.title: 随着比特币飙升，奢侈品牌考虑接受加密货币支付
item.description: 比特币价值的飙升引起了高端时尚品牌和零售商的注意，促使他们进一步关注提供加密货币作为支付手段，以挖掘新的财富口袋，并与加密货币投资者建立忠诚度。【原文：Bitcoin’s soaring value has caught the attention of high-end fashion brands and retailers, prompting further interest in offering cryptocurrencies as a means of payment to tap in to fresh pockets of wealth and build loyalty with crypto investors.】
